achievements_certifications.title: Topper of My Branch
achievements_certifications.shortDescription: I secured the highest academic rank in my branch with a CGPA of 8.95, maintaining excellent grades throughout my academic journey.

achievements_certifications.title: Top 1% in NPTEL IIT Bombay Demystifying Networks Exam
achievements_certifications.shortDescription: Ranked among the top 1% in a national-level networking exam conducted by IIT Bombay, demonstrating strong technical and analytical skills.

achievements_certifications.title: CS50 Web Development Course Completion
achievements_certifications.shortDescription: Completed CS50 Web Development using Python and JavaScript and gained strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Git, CI/CD principles, security, and Django.

achievements_certifications.title: GeeksforGeeks Coding Challenge Winner
achievements_certifications.shortDescription: Declared a winner of the GFG 160 Days Challenge for consistently solving problems, improving competitive programming and problem-solving skills.

achievements_certifications.title: 3rd Winner - 39th MPYSC Innovation Challenge
achievements_certifications.shortDescription: Won 3rd place for developing a Smart Home Automation project at the MP Young Scientist Congress, showcasing innovation and technical expertise.

leadershipActivities.title: Competitive Programming Student Coordinator
leadershipActivities.shortDescription: Selected as the Competitive Programming Coordinator to guide students in problem-solving, organize coding sessions, and promote a coding culture.

leadershipActivities.title: Infosys Springboard Cohort 4 - Pragati Path to Future
leadershipActivities.shortDescription: Selected for Infosys Springboard Cohort 4 - Pragati Path to Future, a program focused on technical skill-building, career growth, and professional development.

leadershipActivities.title: Lead - GeeksforGeeks Student Chapter (MITS)
leadershipActivities.shortDescription: Leading the GeeksforGeeks Student Chapter at MITS, collaborating with peers to organize coding challenges and mentor students in problem-solving.

leadershipActivities.title: Student Coordinator - Innovation & DIY Club
leadershipActivities.shortDescription: Guiding students in hands-on IoT projects at the Innovation & DIY Club, fostering technical skills and encouraging innovative thinking.
